cause.description:
The events that struck the campus of Virginia Tech on the morning of April 16th, 2007 will not soon be forgotten. Nor will the memories of the Hokie students and faculty who lost their lives on that day. A campus was changed forever but it has been demonstrated with absolute certainty that no act of evil will ever keep the Hokies from uniting in support of one another.
The world has seen the strength of the Hokie Nation on display since the day of the tragedy and although we will continue to mourn, we will always persevere.
www.hokiesmemorialrun.com
* Please help us by donating funds or by inviting your friends
* The Hokie Spirit Memorial Run was created in order to raise the funds necessary to endow a scholarship in honor of the Virginia Tech students and faculty that lost their lives on April 16th, 2007.
* On October 28th 100 Hokie Spirit Memorial Runners will participate in the Marine Corps Marathon in Washington D.C.
* Each runner has pledged to raise at least $1,000 if the minimum amount necessary to establish a scholarship, $100,000 is to be attained.
**************************************
If you would feel more comfortable donating via check vs. donating online please let me know
**************************************
1. The Hokie Spirit Memorial Run Endowment Scholarship
